name: Ac'vuk
effect:
Nothrog
Ac'vuk is killed at the end of any turn in which he didn't inflict at least one wound on an opposing character with a melee stike or action.
"Blood lust sustains him. It is his greatest strength and greatest weakness."

name: Amulet of Waking
effect:
For the purposes of card effects, this character is always considered ready. This character may perform non-spend actions while stunned.
"Interesting days." - The Terror of Sharn Keep

name: Andover Assault
effect:
Elf only.
Order: Target an opposing Siege character within one rank. Perform a melee strike targeting a character in the rank behind the Siege character.
"I'd like to see the Elves try to get past these walls." - Sir Wallence

name: Animdar
effect:
Elf
After Animdar suffers a wound, he becomes stunned and permanently gains the trait Undead and the class Wizard.
"They say he's trapped between life and death, age and reason, want and need. Bloated and worthless is more like it." - Sir Wallence

name: Arcane Archery
effect:
Order: Discard a spell from your hand to give this character Marksmanship +10 until the end of the turn.
"Told you she loved me." - Jack Casey

name: Archer Tower
effect:
Mercenary • Siege
May not attack, equip items or use action cards.
All other characters in a rank with one or more non-stunned Archer Towers add +6 to their ranged strike rolls.

name: Armor of Malluk
effect:
Armor
This character gains an additional +3 AC (+6 total) whenever he or she is the target of a melee strike or ranged strike by a character of opposite alignment.
This character is +1 level for casting spells.

name: Azh'guttk
effect:
Nothrog •Elven Ambassador
Riposte +4
You do not have to pay a loyalty penalty to bring Elves into play.
You call these shards of bone, weapons? Surely the Nothrog armies can help equip you in your war with the humans.

name: Back Alley Tavern
effect:
React: After another player uses a card effect to draw a card or retrieve a card from his or her deck, draw two cards.
Spend Order: Draw a card.
"That ain't mold. It's 'local color.'"

name: Bane
effect: Order:

name: Baraxton Defense
effect:
Free Kingdoms only.
Spend Order: Discard any number of cards from your hand. This character performs a number of consecutive +2 ranged strikes equal to the number of cards discarded. These strikes may not receive any bonuses to the die roll.
The Nothrog want the city, lets give it to them. One brick at a time." - Logan

name: Bek'tor Elshemeer
effect:
Mercenary
Spend React: After a character performs an action to draw a card or retrieve a card from their deck, inflict one wound on the character.
Let me show you the meaning of pain. Get over here!

name: Beniss Caolwader
effect:
Free Kingdoms •Elven Ambassador
Charisma +4
You do not have to pay a loyalty penalty to bring Elves into play.
I say put an end to this war and bring an end to the strife between man and elf. Sir Robert, shall we make it so?

name: Blackiron Dagger
effect:
Weapon
Order: Discard a spell from your hand to give this character +3 ATK and +3 AC until the end of the turn.
You can sense its power, even from a distance. Wise men do not trifle with such weapons.

name: Blackiron Medallion
effect:
Order: Discard a spell from your hand to give this character +3 ATK, +3 AC and +1 level until the end of the turn.
"The kingdom of the Storm is at hand." - Cardinal Scelus

name: Blackiron Shield
effect:
Shield
Order: Discard a spell from your hand to give this character +3 ATK and +3 AC until the end of the turn.
Magic feeds it, but its powers run far deeper than mere sorcery.

name: Blackiron Wand
effect:
Order: Discard a spell from your hand to give this character +3 ATK, +3 AC, and +1 level until the end of the turn.
Even a wizard can become a fearsome combatant with the right tools.

name: Blackoak Arrows
effect:
React: Play before this rogue makes a ranged strike roll to add +3 to the die roll.
More accurate than regular arrows and harder to pull out of someone's skin once they've punched through the armor. Yeah, I'd say they're worth 2 got crowns each.

name: Blessed Ground
effect:
Order: Target a spent item equipped by this cleric. Ready the item.
If the Free Kingdoms wish to attack again, lead them here. Ellyah's Children will be waiting. - Saunginel

name: Blood Oath
effect:
Order: Attach this card to this character. While attached, the character's alignment and faction match those of your Warlord.
"I accept your terms, Aenne, but I have a few of my own... " - Cador

name: Borgen Ferriss
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Riding +7
Spend Order: Look at the top 10 cards of your deck. If one of them is a Steed, show it to your opponents, then put it in your hand. Put the other cards on the bottom of your deck.

name: Bow of Destruction
effect:
Level 8-Rogue
Bow • Rangersmay equip the Bow of Destruction as if they were rogues.
Order: Once per turn, perform a +6 ranged strike.
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike. This strike inflicts two additional wounds on Siege characters.
Vengeance flew from the elf's bowstring like thunderbolts from heavens.

name: Bracers of Deflection
effect:
Shield • Magic Resistance +0
React:Once per turn, before a melee strike roll or ranged strike roll targeting this character, this character gains +2 AC until the end of the turn.
"One cannot command true magic without growing at least a little... cautious."

name: Breach the Wall
effect:
Spend Order: Target a Siege card within one rank. Discard that card.
"Only one big, dumb Nothrog holds the south wall. That's our way out." - Logan

name: Burn It to the Ground
effect:
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all rogues have +3 AC.
"All my stuff's back there!"

name: Burr Under the Saddle
effect:
Order: Target a character within two ranks with a Steed equipped. The target character must succeed with a Riding check (DC 15) or the Steed is discarded and the character is spent.
"Time to find out whether your master is truly the horseman he claims to be."

name: By Cover of Night
effect: Spend React: Play after this character is targeted by a melee strike or ranged strike. This character switches places with another character in your army. The other character now becomes the target of the strike.

name: Captain Dukat
effect:
Free Kingdoms Warlord • Scout
Unique •Toris Kelt
Ranged strikes by your other Free Kingdoms characters gain +3 to the roll.
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
Order: Once per turn, discard a spell from your hand to perform a +5 ranged strike.
"Let the outcasts be your saviors."

name: Cashious
effect:
Elf
Spend Order: Target a character in an adjacent rank of your formation. Move the taeget character to this rank.
He moves like a moth and strikes like a wasp. - Rora Blackmane

name: Castle Gate
effect:
Mercenary • Siege
May not attack, equip items or use action cards.
All other characters in a rank with one or more non-stunned Castle Gates have +4 ATK.

name: Cloak of Brilliance
effect:
Armor • Charisma +5
"They hate the light, do they? Send them my way; I might change their minds."

name: Cloudracer
effect:
Steed
Order: Discard a card from your hand to move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Spend Cloudracer to move forward or backward one rank.
"Faster, my friend! We may already be too late."

name: Cobalt Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle
May not equip items. You must have a cleric in your army to bring Cobalt Gargoyle into play.
"They can talk just fine, but they're too good to speak to the likes of us." - Ash

name: Cold Iron Shackles
effect:
Spend Order: Target a lower-level rogue within three ranks. Spend the target character.
"Scream all you like, thief. None can hear you but the dead... "

name: Cursed Spellbook
effect:
Cursed
React: Spend the Cursed Spellbook before this wizard declares the target of a spell. The target may be one additional rank away.
The screams echoed through the hall as unspeakable words were seared into the wizard's brain.

name: Daric Tully
effect:
Free Kingdoms
React: After a character in your army rolls a natural '20', ready Daric.
"We used to employ him during our assassinations, to cover our escape. Last I heard of him, he was with Logan." - Black Tom

name: Dark Blades, Dark Tidings
effect:
Evil characters only.
Spend Order: Target and kill a character in your army. Until the end of the turn, all evil characters in your army gain +X ATK, where X is equal to the target's level.
Orazhuk, take one of the slaves and prepare your ritual. We attack tonight! - Krun

name: Defensive Wall
effect:
Mercenary • Siege
May not attack, equip items or use action cards. May not start the game in play.
Any character may perform the action "Order: Spend characters in your front rank with 3 or more combined levels to kill the Defensive Wall."

name: Digger
effect:
Dwarf
Digger gains +2 ATK and +2 AC for each Siege character in this rank.
"A two-handed axe?! Don't make me laugh. That's about as useful as a ballista down here."

name: Disguise Kit
effect:
Armor
This rogue gains an AC bonus equal to the number of other characters in this rank. The AC bonus cannot exceed the rogue's skill. The rogue loses the AC bonuses from all other items he or she has equipped.
"They'll be expecting an army at Luthlarius, Sali, not a couple of Misearian traders." - Johan

name: Divine Protection and Guidance
effect:
React: Play after an action by an opposing character directly spends or stuns a character in your army. Ready your character.
My lord is my guide and I am his hand. I shall not waver and in his care I lay my trust. - Paladin's Battle Prayer

name: Divine Selection
effect:
Order: Until the end of the turn, this cleric may not suffer wounds or perform actions.
Some welcome a god's calling; other's are blinded by it.

name: Draljaca Tar
effect:
Nothrog
Spend Order: Target a character within one rank. The target character has -5 AC until the end of the turn.

name: Draven
effect:
Elf • Druid •Netheryn
Order: Discard a card from your hand to give Draven +2 ATK until the end of the turn.
"We need to figure out how Tepheroth delivers her orders. We do that, and the war's all but ours." - Sir Robert

name: Duke Blackthorne
effect:
Deverenian • Paladin •Ghenis
Duke Blackthorne may not be targeted by melee strikes with an ATK less than +6. Duke Blackthorne may play 1st level cleric spells.
"I've spoken to Modred, my fair Duchess, byt the Hierophant hath no time for the likes of thee."

name: Dustin St. Gulik
effect:
Free Kingdoms
React: After a character performs an action to discard an item in your army, perform a melee strike targeting that character.
"Diamond-studded lock picks?!" - Basil Nemis

name: Enfilade Fire
effect:
React: Play before this character declares the target of a ranged strike. If your army's 1st rank has more characters than the target army's 1st tank, your character has Marksmanship +10 until the end of the turn.
"Taoth is coming, boys. Send her my regards." - Savrukk

name: Equipment Shop
effect:
Fighter or rogue only.
Order: Target a spent item equipped by this character. Ready the item.
"30 crowns for a crossbow." THUMP! " Oh, it's YOU, tanner." - Basil Nemis

name: Eyestalk of Resistance
effect:
Reaver only.
Magic Resistance +5.
As hard as diamonds it was, an alien piece of an utterly horrifying being.

name: Fauhn Boralis
effect:
Deverenian • Dwarven Ambassador
Viscount • Charisma +4
You do not have to pay a loyalty penalty to bring Dwarves into play.
My liege, we are trying to reach peace with the Dwarves, not slaughter each one we see.

name: Favored Enemy
effect:
Ranger only.
Order: Name a faction and attach this card to this character. While it's attached, this character adds +3 to any melee strike roll or ranged strike roll targeting a character of the selected faction.

name: Fight Across the Rooftops
effect:
Order: Until the end of the turn, this character has the following ability: "React: After this character is targeted with a melee strike or action, perform an Acrobatics check (DC 17). If successful, the stike or action is canceled; if not, this character suffers one wound."
"AAAAAAAAAAAAaaaaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhhhh... " - Jonah the Burglar

name: Fight in the Sewers
effect:
Fighter and rogue only.
React: Play before this character makes a melee strike roll if there are fewer characters in his or her rank than in the target's rank. Either you may add +5 to the die roll, or the strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits (your choice).
"We lost Mace and Tinder below, Yaw. Something else is in the tunnels." - Claw

name: Find a Way
effect:
React: Play after an action performed by this character is canceled. The action is not canceled and continues normally.
Spend Order: Target a Siege character within one rank. Discard the target character.
I told you I would find a way in. I have yet to find a wall that can withstand a good piece of oak.

name: Flank Them!
effect:
Fighter or rogue only.
React: Play before this character makes a melee strike roll if there are more characters in his or her rank than in the target's rank. Either you may add +5 to the die roll, or the strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits (your choice).
"There ain't no such thing as a fair fight ya twit!" - Sir Wallence

name: Flashing Hooves
effect: Order: Spend a Steed equipped to this character to perform a melee strike with an ATK of +3. Items equipped by this character other than the Steed do not affect the strike.

name: Flight
effect:
Order: Target a character in your army. Until the end of the turn, that character has the ability: "Order: Discard a card from your hand to move forward or backward one rank."
A beautiful fantasy, a dream of men for countless millennia... now turned to the purpose of destruction.

name: Forge
effect:
Mercenary
Spend React: After a character performs an action to discard an item in your army, cancel the action. The item remains equipped.
"You lost your what? Okay, gimme an hour... "

name: General Lund
effect:
Mercenary Warlord • Unique
Charisma +4
Spend Order: Once per turn, target up to two lower level spent (not stunned) Mercenary characters. Ready the target character(s).
"If we must meet Death today, let us not meet him empty-handed!"

name: Get Down!
effect:
React: Play after a melee strike roll targets this fighter with an ATK of +6 or less. The strike is canceled.
Get down again!

name: Ghost Bog
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
Spend React: After a character performs an action, spend the character.
Most believe the ghost bogs are dead women, forced to live a tortured afterlife. But I've seen them. They are no ghosts. Anthing that can eat flesh is real.

name: Gift of Life
effect:
Spend Order: Target a spent or stunned wizard in play. Kill this character to ready the target wizard. If this character is a Necromancer, he or she is not killed but suffers one wound instead.
"They never give it willingly. Pity."

name: Great Axe
effect:
ATK +2 AC-2
Weapon
This character inflicts an additional wound whenever he or she hits with a melee strike.
It's the backswing that really gets you...

name: Griis
effect:
Mercenary
Griis is +3 levels for equipping items.
When Griis leaves play, put all items equipped to him into your hand.
Ruuslik, my brother, we do not belong here. This is not our war. These are not our people.

name: Hammer of Flattening
effect:
Weapon
This character inflicts two additional wounds whenever he or she hits a Siege character with a melee strike.
"We were going to call it 'Hammer of Unimaginable Pain Beyond the Ken of Mortals,' but it wouldn't fit on the handle."

name: Harty Tate
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Will only join a Free Kingdoms Warlord
Spend Order: Discard a card to draw a card.
"He's a dying man; he only wishes to live to see peace come once again."

name: Heart of the Stag
effect: Order: Shuffle this character and all items equipped by the character into your deck (discarding all attached action cards.) If your Warlord leaves play in this way, you lose the game.

name: Hold Person
effect:
Spend Order: Target a ready lower-level character. Spend the target character.
Spend Order: Target a spent lower-level character. Stun the target character.
"I'm sorry, noble warrior, but I'm afraid I can't allow you to leave."

name: Holy Ground
effect:
React: After an opposing character of opposite alignment targets this fighter with a melee strike, the fighter performs a Fortitude check (DC 16). If successful, Ready this fighter.
Glory to the Storm. Glory to the Emperor. All hail the Queen of Lightning.

name: Improvised Shield
effect:
Shield
React: Discard Improvised Shield after this character suffers one or more wounds to reduce the wounds being inflicted by one.
In the heat of battle, even the flimsiest defense can save a man's life.

name: Inheritance
effect:
React: After this rogue kills an opposing character with a melee strike or action, search your deck for an item this rogue may legally equip, and equip it to him or her.
"I'm sure he'd have wanted me to have it, whoever he was." - Dustin St. Gulik

name: Innate Ability
effect:
Order: Attack a 1st or 2nd level wizard spell from your hand to this character. While it's attached, this character can cast the spell once per turn, as if it were played from your hand.
"Magic is in my blood, foolish human. It is as much a part of me as my eyes or hands."

name: Inquisitor Chroneus
effect:
Deverenian • Seer
Spend React: Before rolling initiative, add +10 to you die.
"Fate is not a road; it is a wheel. To see its spokes, you merely have to note how quickly it turns."

name: Inquisitor Mastus
effect:
Deverenian •May equip 2 Weapons.
Spend Order: Discard a cleric spell from your hand to target a spent character within three ranks. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 20) or become stunned.
Redemption is found through pain.

name: Intuition
effect:
Spend React: After a character in your army performs an order, perform an additional order.
"I see it... yes... yes, it could work... Now! Strike now!"

name: Invisible Shield
effect:
Shield
You must spend a wizard to bring this card into play.
Arak Spire stands amidst ruin; a lonely reminder or Corinth's prime.

name: Jalallaek
effect:
Nothrog • Stealth +5
Jalallaek may not be targeted by spells.
Spend Order: Target a wizard within one rank. Inflict a wound on the target wizard.
"A Nothrog? At Arak Spire? Preposterous." - Anton

name: K'evan of the Green
effect:
Dwarf • Free Kingdoms Ambassador
Medicine +4
You do not have to pay a loyalty penalty to bring Free Kingdoms into play.
My mentor was slain by Elves and returned as a... guardian. So long as I serve Ashrock, I'll also serve the good people of Andover.

name: Kallus
effect:
Nothrog • Druid
Spend React: When bringing a character from another faction into play, ignore the loyalty penalty, and give that character the Nothrog trait, permanently.
"Look up again, meat puppet, and I'll strip your back down to the bone"

name: Killing Strike
effect:
May be played by 1st and 2nd level Assassins.
Spend Order: Target a stunned character within one rank. Kill the target character.
A moment's hesitation - that's all it takes.

name: King Dukault
effect:
Mercenary • Undead
You must spend an evil cleric to bring the character into play. At the beginning of each turn, good characters in the same army as Dukault suffer one wound. Dukault inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with a melee strike.
"The Assassins Strike impressed some more than others." - Giehox Nemesis

name: Kzarrik
effect:
Nothrog •Deverenian Ambassador
Powerattack +4
You do not have to pay a loyalty penalty to bring Deverenians into play.
The Deverenians offer wealth and steel, neither of which we need. Our armies are fed and our rearguard protected. Yet, Kzarrik accepts their gifts without balking.

name: Laurle
effect:
Elf • Nothrog Ambassador • Stealth +4
You do not have to pay a loyalty penalty to bring Nothrogs into play.
"Call it an 'alliance of convenience.' Our combined strength can crush our mutual foes... then we shall be free to siegetle any lingering issues between us."

name: Life Tap
effect:
Undead only.
Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks. Inflict one wound on the target character.
"Life is wasted on the living." - Giehox Nemesis

name: Lord Joxanus
effect:
Deverenian
Spend Order: Target an item within two ranks. Discard the target item.
"He can turn the most sacred of artifacts to dust with a thought." - Khevanna

name: Lord Theissen
effect:
Deverenian • Nothrog Ambassador
Riposte +4
You do not have to pay a loyalty penalty to bring Nothrogs into play.
"I understand these animals. I know how to placate them, how to enrage them... how to make them ours."

name: Lukkot Ambush
effect:
Nothrog only.
Spend Order: Target a Siege character in play. Move the target character forward or backward one rank.
The fire rained down. Shops, temples and homes were destroyed in a single volley.

name: Lukkot Warplow
effect:
Nothrog • Siege
May not equip items or use action cards. May not Maneuver.
Order: Spend another character in this rank to move the Warplow forward one rank.
"... mother... " - Basil Nemis

name: Luthlarius Defense
effect:
Deverenian only.
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, all Deverenians have +2 AC while in this rank.
"More than steel guardeth the streets of the Emperor's city." - Master Halvedar

name: Magic Shop
effect:
Order: Target a spent item equipped by this character. Ready the target item.
"You break it, you bought it, O' Almighty Spellslinger."

name: Malciaar of Ghenist
effect:
Deverenian •Ghenis
Malciaar may not be targeted by melee strikes with an ATK of less than +2.
Malciaar gains +3 ATK when performing a melee strike targeting a wizard.
My father's axe can cut through more men than the Dwarves have, sire.

name: Malluk's Hammer
effect:
Weapon
This character inflicts two additional wounds whenever he or she hits a Siege character with a melee strike.
"It is said that Malluk saw the development of catapults and ballistas as the end of noble warfare." - Khevanna

name: Master Isil Loth
effect:
Deverenian Warlord • Necromancer
Unique
May play 1st and 2nd level fighter actions.
Spend Order: Target a rank within two ranks of Isil Loth. Until the end of the turn, all characters have -5 AC while in that rank.

name: Mirror Magic
effect:
Order:Target an adjacent character card and select an action printed on the target. This character is considered to have that action printed on his or her card until the end of the turn.
The image rippled like water as the energy streamed through the barrier.

name: Misear Strike
effect:
Mercenary only.
React: Play before this character performs a melee strike roll targeting a spent character. The melee strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits.
"Figure my father'll wake up with flea any day now." - Keziah

name: Mistress Allandra
effect:
Elf
React: Once per turn, after Allandra kills another character with a ranged strike, ready her.
Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike.

name: Mistress Kohn
effect:
Deverenian •Swordmaster
May not equip items except Weapons.
Mistress Kohn may not Attack unless she has a Weapon equipped.
"My second, but I daresay she fighteth for any reason save but to fight." - Master Halvedar

name: Myhrena
effect:
Elf • Scout
Spend React: Before an Elf in your army makes a ranged strike roll, add +10 to the die roll.
No matter how much control the Nothrog exert over this city, they'll never control the sewers and alleys and roofs.

name: Narrow Alley
effect:
React: Play after this character suffers two or more wounds. Reduce the wounds being inflicted to one.
It's not so much who you're fightin' as where you're fightin' them.

name: Necromantic Regeneration
effect:
Spend Order: Target an Undead character within three ranks. Remove two wounds from the target character.
Don't waste your time with the zombies and skeletons. The smart warrior takes the fight straight to the Necromancer.

name: New Goldenaxe Defense
effect:
Dwarf only.
Spend React: After this character suffers one or more wounds, spend an adjacent Dwarf to reduce the number of wounds to zero.
"Gahid's forces have doubled in the last two days, but he has not pressed his advantage. Something's happening outside, Strongarm, and I want to know what it is." - Gnarrow Yaw

name: Nightclaw
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Abyssal
Astral (even strikes miss)
Nightclaw gains +1 ATK for each other Abyssal in this rank.

name: Ninifaeer
effect:
Elf • Assassin • Stealth +5
Ninifaeer has +5 AC while in an opposing formation. Ninifaeer inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with a melee strike while in an opposing formation.
He came in the night, soft as rain... and merciless as the Storm itself.

name: Olrik Hammerfall
effect:
Elf • Undead Dwarf
Dwarves add +5 to the melee strike roll when targeting Olrik with melee strikes.
Olrik swore fealty to Angus, but was destroyed by Douglass. Later, the elves found the body and made it whole again. Almost.

name: Otho Yscar
effect:
Mercenary • Lycanthrope • Monster
"I don't trust creatures with more than four limbs." - Khevanna

name: Portable Wall
effect:
This character may not Maneuver, attack, equip items or use action cards.
Siege characters cannot target this character with actions. This character and those adjacent have +6 AC versus ranged strikes.
Order: Spend one of your adjacent characters to move this character forward or backwards one rank.

name: Purge
effect:
Dwarf • Deverenian Ambassador
Powerattack +4
You do not have to pay a loyalty penalty to bring Deverenians into play.
No matter the words coming from their lips, I trust not the Deverenians. But I know determination when I see it and i cannot deny their strength.

name: Ramparts
effect:
Mercenary • Siege
May not attack, equip items or use action cards.
All other characters in a rank with one or more non-stunned Ramparts have +4 AC.

name: Reckless Leap
effect:
Order: Move this character forward up to two ranks. The character has -5 AC until the end of the turn.
"Nobody can make that!"

name: Regeneration
effect:
Monster only.
React: Play after this character is killed. Put this character into your hand instead of the discard pile. All attached actions and equipped items are still discarded.
You will need oil, a lot of oil, and a big torch if you want to take that thing down. You had best take my sword as well...

name: Religious Council
effect: Spend order:

name: Repair Crew
effect:
May only be equipped by Siege characters. May be equipped by Siege characters that can not normally equip items.
+1 Hit Point.
"Do that stupid voice again, and you'll be the one who 'cannae take it'" - Sceth

name: Resistance
effect:
Dwarf
Spend Order: Resistance gains +8 AC until the end of the turn.
Spend Order: Target another character in play. The target character gains +4 AC until the end of the turn.
"Stone is my ally. I am as constant as the rock itself."

name: Ronan Cody
effect:
Free Kingdoms
React: Once per turn, after Ronan is targeted with a melee strike or ranged strike, he gains +10 AC for the duration of the strike.
"He'll get the message through."

name: Rreg'jen
effect:
Nothrog Warlord • Unique
Your hand size is ruduced by 4. All opposing Warlords have the ability: "Order: Discard all cards from your hand."
React: After the player to your left performs an Order, draw a card if the player has one or more cards in his hand and Rreg'jen is your Warlord.

name: Sacred Altar
effect:
Order: Spend a character in this rank to give this character +1 level for casting spells until the end of the turn.
"Should you fall, my lord, I will bring you back." - Cardinal Scelus

name: Sarakian Battle Cat
effect:
Free Kingdoms •May not equip items
Powerattack +10 • Riposte +10
The beast's roar echoed above the pounding rain as it locked its eyes with its hapless foe.

name: Saunginel
effect:
Elf Warlord • Necromancer
Unique • Scribe +6
Your hand size is increased by one.
Characters in your army may not use card effects to draw cards or retrieve cards from your deck.
"Please, cousins, treat them gently. The humans should recognize our fodder, or else it's just savagery."

name: Serrated Broadsword
effect:
Weapon • Shield
Order: Spend Serrated Broadsword to give this character +4 ATK or +3 AC until the end of the turn.
A proper weapon need not kill immediately. Cut deeply enough, and your opponent will bleed out like a hog in a slaughterhouse.

name: Shadowreaver
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Abyssal
Astral (even strikes miss) • Melee strikes against Shadowreaver with an ATK less than 5 automatically miss.
Order: Once per game, attach a 1st or 2nd level wizard spell to Shadowreaver. While attached, he can cast the spell once per turn as if it were played from your hand and he were a wizard.

name: Sigil of Strength
effect:
You must spend a cleric to put this card into play. May only be equipped by Siege characters. May be equipped by Siege characters that can not normally equip items.
"Orazhuk, when you finish the ritual, prepare the machine. We will drown them in their own blood." - Krun

name: Silver Bane
effect:
Dragon • Unique
May not equip items. Evil characters within one rank have -3 ATK and -3 AC.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.
Spend Order: Target another character within one rank. Remove all wounds from the target character.

name: Sirenspawn
effect:
Mercenary • Dragon • Unique
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Select a target for a +7 ranged strike, then target a 2nd character in the rank behind the 1st. These ranged strikes cause 2 wounds. If the 1st strike kills its target, perform a +4 ranged strike against the 2nd target.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.

name: Skincrawler
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Abyssal
Astral (even strikes miss)
Order: Spend an Abyssal in the rank in front of this one to move Skincrawler forward one rank. If Skincrawler is in the 1st rank, he may spend to attack.

name: Skurg Bloodlick
effect:
Nothrog • Powerattack +3
"You! You in the corner! Don't move, I'm gonna come over there an' stick you. It'll hurt more if you make me run."

name: Sledge
effect:
Dwarf
Sledge does not ready normally during the ready phase.
Order: Once per turn, discard a card from your hand to ready Sledge.
The anvil lies at rest without the hammer. The hammer shatters bone while the anvil rests.

name: Son of the Clouds
effect:
Free Kingdoms •Dwarven Ambassador
Powerattack +4
You do not have to pay a loyalty penalty to bring Dwarves into play.

name: Soul Binding
effect:
Spend Order: Discard up to three cards from your hand. You opponent must discard the same number of cards from his or her hand.
"Don't struggle, dear sir. We have all eternity to get to know each other... "

name: Soul Blade
effect:
Weapon
React:After this fighter kills an opposing character, the fighter selects one action printed on the target character. The fighter is considered to have the action printed on him or her until this react is used again or the Soul Blade is removed from the fighter.

name: Staff of Reincarnation
effect:
Weapon
Spend React: After one of your characters in this or an adjacent rank is killed, shuffle the character and all equipped cards into your deck. Discard any actions attached to the character.

name: Staff of Secrets
effect:
Weapon
React: Spend the Staff after a character performs an action to draw a card or retrieve a card from their deck. Cancel the action.
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, card effects may not be used to draw cards.
"Not this time, old friend. This time, you get to see no more of the future than any of us." - Sorscha

name: Staunch
effect:
Dwarf
React: Once per turn, after a Dwarf in your army of lower level than Staunch is killed, shuffle the Dwarf into your deck.
"Heal the Deverenians with one hand, bash them with the other. See which works best."

name: Stern
effect:
Dwarf
Stern gains +1 ATK and +1 AC for each other Dwarf fighter in this rank.
We thought the battle lost, then he arrived. - Hammer

name: Stonefist
effect:
Dwarf •Blackstone Raider
Powerattack +5
Stonefist inficts an additional wound whenever he hits with a melee strike.
"What, you thought I'd wait long enough for you to finish casting the spell?"

name: Storm Shadow
effect:
Deverenian • Astral (even strikes miss)
Stealth +8
Spend Order: Perform a melee strike targeting a character in this rank. The stike inflicts two additional wounds if it hits.
Damn your prophecies. The gate is open and so shall it remain.

name: Stormchaser
effect:
Mercenary • Dragon • Unique
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn, target a character one rank away. The target performs a magic save (DC 23) or becomes stunned.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.

name: Strong Arm
effect:
Order: Perform a melee strike with an ATK of +0. Items equipped by this fighter have no effect for the duration of this strike.
It don't break the skin, but it leaves a nasty bruise. And when he wakes up in a few days, he'll remember my blow.

name: Stupid Luck
effect:
React: Play before this character makes a die roll. Roll two dice and choose which one to take.
Luck and fate are never the same. Luck and idiocy are often related, though.

name: Sulluman
effect:
Elf • Free Kingdoms Ambassador
Riposte +4
You do not have to pay a loyalty penalty to bring Free Kingdoms charactersinto play.
"Our goals are not so different. Come into my tent, and I shall explain further."

name: Summon Object
effect:
Summoners play this action without spending.
Spend Order: Search your discard pile for an item card, show it to the other players, and put it in your hand. You cannot retrieve a card if you have already retrieved a card with that name from your discard pile earlier in the game.

name: Syad
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Order: Once per turn, change Syad's alignment to evil, permanently.
Order: Once per turn, change Syad's alignment to good, permanently.
In such times, madness may be the only defensible refuge.

name: Symbol of Warding
effect:
Spend Order: Target a rank in any player's army. The next character that moves into that rank this turn must make a magic save (DC 13) or suffer a wound.
I have heard of a king's son who liked the look of it so much that he took the glyph as his name.

name: Tavern Brawl
effect:
React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll. Subtract 2 from the die roll. If the strike hits, stun the target before wounds are inflicted.
Bar wench?!? Another ale to bash this bugger's skull with.

name: The Lady's Doom
effect:
Order: Until the end of the turn, all characters have -5 AC while in the first rank of any army.
We did what we could. The ranks soon broke and the elven archers tore us apart. I have never seen a unit so shaken. Had I not fallen back, I would not be here to tell you the tale.

name: Through a Table
effect:
Spend React: Play after a melee strike roll targeting this character. If the strike missed, stun the attacking character.
"Whoop! Time to go... "

name: Thunic Roc
effect:
Mercenary
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.
"I've never seen the Thunic lands, but I fear its beasts and its survivors."

name: Time Stop
effect:
Order: This wizard may now perform any number of orders in a row until he or she declares "done". Characters other than this wizard may not perform reacts until the wizard is done.
He froze in place, his muscles locked in a single moment of time.

name: Treetalk
effect:
Druid only.
Spend Order: Target a Siege character in play. Kill the target character.
Spend Order: Target a Siege character in play. Remove all wounds from the target character.
She is like a blacksmith. Her hands are her hammer and anvil. The wood in her hands formed like heated metal.

name: Trembling Earth
effect:
Spend Order: Target a Siege character in play. Inflict three wounds on the target character.
The earth calls no man master. We scuttle across her surface like ants, never aware - even in war - of how small and insignificant we truly are.

name: Trench
effect:
Dwarf Warlord • Unique
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, Dwarves in your army gain +3 AC and Riposte +5.
"I give Rockhome a month, two if my men reinforce Rac's. Any longer, and Xod won't have to worry about allies anymore."

name: Twist of Fate
effect:
React: Play after another player uses a card effect to draw one or more cards or retrieve one or more cards from their deck. Discard the card(s).
She smiles upon you now, but her favor is fickle, as always.

name: Use Magic Device
effect:
Order: Equip a wizard item to this rogue, ignoring class restrictions.
Time to see if that doddering old fool has his theories straight.

name: Uthanak's Tower
effect:
Nothrog • Siege
May not attack, equip items or use action cards.
Adjacent characters gain +5 AC and Riposte +5.
"are you sure we're going the right way? This doesn't look like the Battle of Three Vales... "

name: Wall of Stone
effect:
Spend Order: Put this card into your 1st rank as a level 1 classless character with the Siege trait. The Wall has AC 13 (15 if this cleric is a Dwarf), 0 skill and 3 HP, but cannot maneuver, attack, equip items, or perform actions.
"That should hold them until Al'drich and his beasts arrive." - Lord Gahid

name: Wall of Swords
effect:
Spend Order: Target a character in play. Until the end of the turn, the character has the ability: "React: Before a melee strike targeting this character, the attacker must succeed with a Dexterity check (DC 17) or suffer two wounds.
You're gonna need a bow. Better yet, a crossbow. - Sir Robert

name: War Elephant
effect:
Steed
Order: Spend the War Elephant to move forward one rank.
Spend Order: Perform a melee strike with an ATK of +12. The strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits. Other items equipped by this fighter have no effect on this strike.

name: Watchful Guards
effect:
Spend React: After a character moves into this or an adjacent rank, cancel the move.
The Nothrogs have the North Quarter and the West Gate. In no time, they'll control the merchants and then where are we?
